title: Booster shot...
cleaned_text:
Dr. Anthony Fauci, the country’s top disease expert, said in an interview Sunday that there could be a need for Americans with some underlying conditions to take a coronavirus booster shot due to the emergence of dangerous variants.

 

 According to the leaked Pfizer study, the spike protein from COVID-19 vaccines does not remain near the injection site like traditional vaccines. Instead, the spike protein enters a person’s bloodstream and spread throughout the body. It then accumulates in different organs and tissues – causing serious damage. However, the study showed that the liver processes most of the spike protein. 

 

 In a shedding argument I had concerning the spike I was told you can't shed because the spike stays in your arm muscle....She ended up being wrong.

 

 Remembering this jab is experimental..they thought the spikes would stay in the muscle at the point of injection. It didn't.

 

 Now knowing that these spike are causing adverse effect and even death.... WHY WOULD ANYONE GET THE BOOSTER? 

 We are no longer ignorant to what can happen. Instead, the spike protein enters a person’s bloodstream and spread throughout the body. It then accumulates in different organs and tissues – causing serious damage. However, the study showed that the liver processes most of the spike protein. It didn't.Now knowing that these spike are causing adverse effect and even death....We are no longer ignorant to what can happen.

While you are against the vaccines that we have now for the Covid 19, do remember that your choice for your King Donald J. Trump is the one who rushed them into a hurried existence.By the way, you need to read again why God was angry with Israel for wanting another to be their King when God had never ceased to rule over them, for this is the same spirit of the apostate churches who are always concerned about what human King is going to rule over them also, it is because following the same down trend of Israel, they also resist the way God is ruling over them.For God doesn't always want us to be more prosperous or to make this world a replacement for heaven but many times he wants us to have a leader to bring his correction through because of our greed and selfishness and false doctrines about him and which one bringing more prosperity will never do.
